title: S17 Ep30: Destination Fear: Trail to Terror w/Dakota Laden & Tanner Wiseman
itunes:title: Destination Fear: Trail to Terror w/Dakota Laden & Tanner Wiseman
description:
Darkness Radio presents: Destination Fear: Trail to Terror with Dakota Laden & Tanner Wiseman!

On today's show, Darkness Radio welcomes back Dakota and Tanner to talk about the new Discovery Plus movie, Destination Fear: Trail to Terror. DF:TOT looks into the beginnings of the group and a five day challenge as the group hits five of he most haunted paranormal hotspots over five days, and spends the night! The psychological and spiritual toll and sleep deprivation, begin to take their toll on the group before they barely get to the midway point! We get the behind the scenes scoop on some of the scarier scenes of the film and talk about why they don't consider themselves "paranormal investigators".

Check out Destination Fear on Twitter: https://twitter.com/destinationfear
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
